TextView.android:text: Me, Hiten Parmar was not a topper in the subject of Physics at School level. But I was very well aware of my limitations and tried to give my best at all stages in the situation. I did my schooling from Kendriya Vidhyalaya and Demonstration multipurpose high school, Ajmer. I made my school proud by clearing NTSE and NDA. I was keen to join the INDIAN AIR FORCE but had to drop the Idea after clearing SSB due to my spectacles. Then I appeared for the engineering entrance examination and got admission in MBM Enginnering College, Jodhpur. There I felt that PHYSICS is the only subject that can make us excel in any stream of science studies. I REDEFINED MY KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT THERE AND FOUND THE SUBJECT TO BE VERY INNOVATIVE AND INTERESTING. During college only I started taking PHYSICS classes and joined a school as a PHYSICS Faculty.

Talking about my career as a PHYSICS MENTOR in Jaipur, I have taught in various CBSE and ISC schools in the city including CAMBRIDGE COURT HIGH SCHOOL, RYAN INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL, SPRINGFIELD SCHOOL and DELHI PUBLIC SCHOOL. Alongwith it, I have been regularly taking students for leading them success in various engineering and medical entrance examinations. My students have a good record of success in JEE mains (previously AIEEE), JEE ADVANCED, SRMJEE, VITJEE and other examinations. The results of NEET (previously AIPMT/RPMT) and AIIMS are one of the best in the city.
